Html:
Hi

I'm a novice trying to learn (at the age of 65) how to build some home-use applications with Visual Basic Express 10.

How can I incorporate the Ribbon in my projects?

Thanks

João

joao.matoso@gmail.com

joaomatoso@hotmail.com
